general.notRecognized: Sorry. I do not know how to do that. Type `;;vortaro help` to see the list of commands.
general.noCommand: Sorry, I cannot do your command at this time. :(
general.noSearch: Sorry, I cannot search for definitions at this time.
general.searchError: I encountered an error while searching for %{searchTerm}: %{error}

intro.desc: Hello! VortaroPH is a simple dictionary bot that can search both Esperanto and English words. The robot uses data from the ESPDIC project, which can be found at http://www.denisowski.org/Esperanto/ESPDIC/espdic_readme.html.

help.desc: Type `;;vortaro help` to make the bot send you a message with the list of valid commands.

support.desc: Any bugs, comments, or suggestions can be sent via DM to @squeekeek, or filed as an issue at https://github.com/abcalceta/UP-Esperas-Website.

help.title: VortaroPH List of Commands
help.replyMsg: I have sent the list of commands via DM to you.
help.showLang: Show in which language the robot is talking.
help.switchLang: Change the language of this robot. We only support `en` and `eo` for now.

switchLang.noLang: I do not know this language yet. :(

search.notFound: I found **No results** found for the term *%{searchTerm}*!
search.found: I have found **%{smart_count}** result for the term *%{searchTerm}*! |||| I have found **%{smart_count}** results for the term *%{searchTerm}*!
